<file path="src/utils/__tests__/validation/irrigationValidator.test.ts">
import { createTestGrid } from './testUtils';
import { CompassDirection } from './types';
import { validateConfiguration } from './validationUtils';
import { IRRIGATION_RULES } from './irrigationRules';
describe('Irrigation Validation Rules', () => {
  describe('Single Cube Configuration', () => {
    it('should validate single cube with valid flow', () => {
      const grid = createTestGrid(
        [[1]],
        {
          '0,0': { entry: 'W' as CompassDirection, exit: 'E' as CompassDirection }
        }
      );
      const [row, col] = [0, 0];
      const cell = grid[row][col];
      expect(validateConfiguration.hasValidConnections(cell)).toBe(true);
      expect(validateConfiguration.hasValidFlow(cell.connections!.entry, cell.connections!.exit)).toBe(true);
      expect(validateConfiguration.countIncomingConnections(grid, row, col)).toBe(0);
    });
  });
  describe('Line Configuration', () => {
    it('should validate three cubes in a line', () => {
      const grid = createTestGrid(
        [[1, 1, 1]],
        {
          '0,0': { entry: 'W' as CompassDirection, exit: 'E' as CompassDirection },
          '0,1': { entry: 'W' as CompassDirection, exit: 'E' as CompassDirection },
          '0,2': { entry: 'W' as CompassDirection, exit: 'E' as CompassDirection }
        }
      );
      // Check middle cube connections
      const [row, col] = [0, 1];
      const cell = grid[row][col];
      expect(validateConfiguration.hasValidConnections(cell)).toBe(true);
      expect(validateConfiguration.hasValidFlow(cell.connections!.entry, cell.connections!.exit)).toBe(true);
      expect(validateConfiguration.countIncomingConnections(grid, row, col)).toBe(1);
      expect(validateConfiguration.isContinuousFlow('E', 'W')).toBe(true);
    });
  });
  describe('L-Shape Configuration', () => {
    it('should validate L-shaped configuration', () => {
      const grid = createTestGrid(
        [[1, 1],
         [0, 1]],
        {
          '0,0': { entry: 'W' as CompassDirection, exit: 'E' as CompassDirection },
          '0,1': { entry: 'W' as CompassDirection, exit: 'S' as CompassDirection },
          '1,1': { entry: 'N' as CompassDirection, exit: 'S' as CompassDirection }
        }
      );
      // Check corner cube
      const [row, col] = [0, 1];
      const cell = grid[row][col];
      expect(validateConfiguration.hasValidConnections(cell)).toBe(true);
      expect(validateConfiguration.hasValidFlow(cell.connections!.entry, cell.connections!.exit)).toBe(true);
      expect(validateConfiguration.countIncomingConnections(grid, row, col)).toBe(1);
      expect(validateConfiguration.isContinuousFlow('E', 'W')).toBe(true);
    });
  });
  describe('U-Shape Configuration', () => {
    it('should validate U-shaped configuration', () => {
      const grid = createTestGrid(
        [[1, 1, 1],
         [1, 0, 1]],
        {
          '0,0': { entry: 'W' as CompassDirection, exit: 'S' as CompassDirection },
          '1,0': { entry: 'N' as CompassDirection, exit: 'E' as CompassDirection },
          '1,1': { entry: 'W' as CompassDirection, exit: 'E' as CompassDirection },
          '1,2': { entry: 'W' as CompassDirection, exit: 'N' as CompassDirection },
          '0,2': { entry: 'S' as CompassDirection, exit: 'E' as CompassDirection }
        }
      );
      // Check first corner cube
      const [row, col] = [0, 0];
      const cell = grid[row][col];
      expect(validateConfiguration.hasValidConnections(cell)).toBe(true);
      expect(validateConfiguration.hasValidFlow(cell.connections!.entry, cell.connections!.exit)).toBe(true);
      expect(validateConfiguration.countIncomingConnections(grid, row, col)).toBe(0);
    });
  });
  describe('Invalid Configurations', () => {
    it('should reject T-junctions', () => {
      const grid = createTestGrid(
        [[0, 1, 0],
         [1, 1, 1]],
        {
          '0,1': { entry: 'S' as CompassDirection, exit: 'N' as CompassDirection },
          '1,0': { entry: 'W' as CompassDirection, exit: 'E' as CompassDirection },
          '1,1': { entry: 'W' as CompassDirection, exit: 'E' as CompassDirection },
          '1,2': { entry: 'W' as CompassDirection, exit: 'E' as CompassDirection }
        }
      );
      // Check T-junction cube
      const [row, col] = [1, 1];
      const cell = grid[row][col];
      // Should have too many incoming connections
      expect(validateConfiguration.countIncomingConnections(grid, row, col)).toBeGreaterThan(1);
    });
  });
});
</file>

<file path="src/utils/calculation/configurationDetector.ts">
import { CompassDirection, GridCell } from '@/components/types';
import { PathCube } from './flowAnalyzer';
import { VALID_TURNS, STRAIGHT_PATHS } from '../core/rules';
import { hasAdjacentCube } from '../shared/gridUtils';
/**
 * Counts the number of flow connections for a cube
 */
const countFlowConnections = (grid: GridCell[][], row: number, col: number): number => {
  let count = 0;
  ['N', 'S', 'E', 'W'].forEach((dir) => {
    if (hasAdjacentCube(grid, row, col, dir as CompassDirection)) {
      count++;
    }
  });
  return count;
};
/**
 * Checks if a cube is an endpoint in the flow
 */
export const isEndpoint = (grid: GridCell[][], row: number, col: number): boolean => {
  return countFlowConnections(grid, row, col) === 1;
};
/**
 * Checks if a cube is a corner in the flow
 */
export const isCorner = (entry: CompassDirection | null, exit: CompassDirection | null): boolean => {
  if (!entry || !exit) return false;
  const turn = `${entry}→${exit}`;
  return VALID_TURNS.has(turn);
};
/**
 * Checks if a cube has straight flow
 */
export const isStraightFlow = (entry: CompassDirection | null, exit: CompassDirection | null): boolean => {
  if (!entry || !exit) return false;
  const path = `${entry}→${exit}`;
  return STRAIGHT_PATHS.has(path);
};
/**
 * Count the number of corner connectors in a path
 */
export const countCornerConnectors = (path: PathCube[]): number => {
  let cornerCount = 0;
  // Corner is detected when a flow changes direction (not straight)
  for (let i = 0; i < path.length; i++) {
    const curr = path[i];
    if (curr.entry && curr.exit) {
      const flow = `${curr.entry}→${curr.exit}`;
      if (VALID_TURNS.has(flow)) {
        console.log(`Detected corner at cube [${curr.row},${curr.col}]: ${flow}`);
        cornerCount++;
      }
    }
  }
  console.log(`Total corners detected: ${cornerCount}`);
  return cornerCount;
};
/**
 * Checks if a configuration is U-shaped
 */
export const isUShapedConfiguration = (path: { cubes: PathCube[] }): boolean => {
  // U-shape must have at least 5 cubes
  if (path.cubes.length < 5) return false;
  // Count corner turns and validate flow direction
  let cornerCount = countCornerConnectors(path.cubes);
  // U-shape must have exactly 2 corners
  if (cornerCount !== 2) return false;
  // Validate U-shape geometry
  const startCube = path.cubes[0];
  const endCube = path.cubes[path.cubes.length - 1];
  // Start and end cubes should be parallel (same row or column)
  return (startCube.row === endCube.row && Math.abs(startCube.col - endCube.col) >= 2) ||
         (startCube.col === endCube.col && Math.abs(startCube.row - endCube.row) >= 2);
};
/**
 * Checks if a configuration is L-shaped
 */
export const isLShapedConfiguration = (path: { cubes: PathCube[] }): boolean => {
  if (path.cubes.length < 3) return false;
  // Count corner turns
  let cornerCount = countCornerConnectors(path.cubes);
  // L-shape must have exactly 1 corner
  if (cornerCount !== 1) return false;
  // Validate L-shape geometry
  const startCube = path.cubes[0];
  const endCube = path.cubes[path.cubes.length - 1];
  // Start and end cubes should be perpendicular
  return (startCube.row !== endCube.row && startCube.col !== endCube.col);
};
/**
 * Helper to get angle between directions (similar to PipelineVisualizer)
 */
export const getAngleBetweenDirections = (dir1: CompassDirection, dir2: CompassDirection): number => {
  const dirToAngle = { N: 0, E: 90, S: 180, W: 270 };
  const angle1 = dirToAngle[dir1];
  const angle2 = dirToAngle[dir2];
  return ((angle2 - angle1 + 360) % 360);
};
</file>

<file path="src/utils/calculation/flowAnalyzer.ts">
import { CompassDirection } from '@/components/types';
export interface PathCube {
  row: number;
  col: number;
  subgrid: { subgridRow: number; subgridCol: number }[];
  entry: CompassDirection | null;
  exit: CompassDirection | null;
  flowDirection: 'horizontal' | 'vertical';
  rotation: 0 | 90 | 180 | 270;  // Updated to include 270 for corner pieces
}
const VALID_FLOWS: Record<CompassDirection, CompassDirection> = {
  N: 'S',
  S: 'N',
  E: 'W',
  W: 'E'
} as const;
/**
 * Determines if a flow is horizontal (W→E or E→W)
 */
const isHorizontalFlow = (direction: CompassDirection | null): boolean => {
  return direction === 'W' || direction === 'E';
};
/**
 * Determines if a flow is vertical (N→S or S→N)
 */
const isVerticalFlow = (direction: CompassDirection | null): boolean => {
  return direction === 'N' || direction === 'S';
};
/**
 * Gets all valid neighbors for a cube
 */
const getNeighbors = (cube: PathCube, path: PathCube[]): { [key in CompassDirection]?: PathCube } => {
  const { row, col } = cube;
  return {
    N: path.find(c => c.row === row - 1 && c.col === col),
    E: path.find(c => c.row === row && c.col === col + 1),
    S: path.find(c => c.row === row + 1 && c.col === col),
    W: path.find(c => c.row === row && c.col === col - 1)
  };
};
/**
 * Normalizes flow through a cube to ensure it follows straight-line rules
 */
export const normalizeFlow = (cubes: PathCube[]): PathCube[] => {
  if (!cubes.length) return [];
  if (cubes.length === 1) {
    // For a single cube, set standard flow direction (in from N, out to S)
    return [{ ...cubes[0], entry: 'N', exit: 'S', flowDirection: 'vertical', rotation: 0 }];
  }
  // For multiple cubes, check if we need to reverse the flow direction
  // We want the flow to start from one end and proceed to the other
  const normalizedCubes = [...cubes];
  // Sort cubes by their position to establish the flow direction
  // For grid-based flow, we prioritize left-to-right, top-to-bottom
  normalizedCubes.sort((a, b) => {
    // Primary sort by row
    if (a.row !== b.row) return a.row - b.row;
    // Secondary sort by column
    return a.col - b.col;
  });
  // Set the subgrid structure for spatial analysis
  const minRow = Math.min(...normalizedCubes.map(c => c.row));
  const maxRow = Math.max(...normalizedCubes.map(c => c.row));
  const minCol = Math.min(...normalizedCubes.map(c => c.col));
  const maxCol = Math.max(...normalizedCubes.map(c => c.col));
  // Determine if we have a U-shape configuration
  const rowCount = maxRow - minRow + 1;
  const colCount = maxCol - minCol + 1;
  const isUShape = isUShapedConfiguration(normalizedCubes, minRow, maxRow, minCol, maxCol);
  if (isUShape) {
    console.log("Flow analyzer detected U-shape configuration");
    return processUShapedConfiguration(normalizedCubes, minRow, maxRow, minCol, maxCol);
  }
  // Determine if we have an L-shape configuration
  const isLShape = isLShapedConfiguration(normalizedCubes, minRow, maxRow, minCol, maxCol);
  if (isLShape) {
    console.log("Flow analyzer detected L-shape configuration");
    return processLShapedConfiguration(normalizedCubes, minRow, maxRow, minCol, maxCol);
  }
  // For straight line configurations, ensure consistent flow
  if (normalizedCubes.length >= 2) {
    const isSingleRow = normalizedCubes.every(c => c.row === normalizedCubes[0].row);
    const isSingleCol = normalizedCubes.every(c => c.col === normalizedCubes[0].col);
    if (isSingleRow) {
      // For horizontal line, ensure flow is left-to-right
      normalizedCubes.sort((a, b) => a.col - b.col);
      return processLinearConfiguration(normalizedCubes, 'horizontal');
    } else if (isSingleCol) {
      // For vertical line, ensure flow is top-to-bottom
      normalizedCubes.sort((a, b) => a.row - b.row);
      return processLinearConfiguration(normalizedCubes, 'vertical');
    }
  }
  // For other configurations, we'll need a custom path
  return analyzeAndTraceFlow(normalizedCubes);
};
/**
 * Process a linear configuration (straight line)
 */
function processLinearConfiguration(cubes: PathCube[], orientation: 'horizontal' | 'vertical'): PathCube[] {
  const result = [...cubes];
  // Set entry and exit points based on orientation
  for (let i = 0; i < result.length; i++) {
    if (i === 0) {
      // First cube
      if (orientation === 'horizontal') {
        result[i].entry = 'W'; // Enter from left
        result[i].exit = 'E';  // Exit to right
      } else {
        result[i].entry = 'N'; // Enter from top
        result[i].exit = 'S';  // Exit to bottom
      }
    } else if (i === result.length - 1) {
      // Last cube
      if (orientation === 'horizontal') {
        result[i].entry = 'W'; // Enter from left
        result[i].exit = 'E';  // Exit to right
      } else {
        result[i].entry = 'N'; // Enter from top
        result[i].exit = 'S';  // Exit to bottom
      }
    } else {
      // Middle cubes
      if (orientation === 'horizontal') {
        result[i].entry = 'W'; // Enter from left
        result[i].exit = 'E';  // Exit to right
      } else {
        result[i].entry = 'N'; // Enter from top
        result[i].exit = 'S';  // Exit to bottom
      }
    }
  }
  return result;
}
/**
 * Check if the configuration forms a U-shape
 */
function isUShapedConfiguration(
  cubes: PathCube[], 
  minRow: number, 
  maxRow: number, 
  minCol: number, 
  maxCol: number
): boolean {
  // A U-shape typically has width >= 3 and cubes in at least two rows
  if (maxRow === minRow || maxCol - minCol < 2 || cubes.length < 5) {
    return false;
  }
  // Create a grid representation to analyze shape
  const grid: boolean[][] = [];
  for (let r = minRow; r <= maxRow; r++) {
    grid[r - minRow] = [];
    for (let c = minCol; c <= maxCol; c++) {
      grid[r - minRow][c - minCol] = false;
    }
  }
  // Mark occupied cells
  cubes.forEach(cube => {
    grid[cube.row - minRow][cube.col - minCol] = true;
  });
  // Check for U-shape pattern: bottom row filled and two sides going up
  const bottomRowFilled = grid[grid.length - 1].every(cell => cell);
  const leftColumnFilled = grid.every(row => row[0]);
  const rightColumnFilled = grid.every(row => row[row.length - 1]);
  // For a U-shape, we need either:
  // 1. Bottom row filled + left and right columns filled
  // 2. Top row filled + left and right columns filled
  // 3. Left column filled + top and bottom rows filled
  // 4. Right column filled + top and bottom rows filled
  // Simplified check - two sides and a connecting section
  const topRowFilled = grid[0].every(cell => cell);
  return (
    (bottomRowFilled && leftColumnFilled && rightColumnFilled) ||
    (topRowFilled && leftColumnFilled && rightColumnFilled) ||
    (leftColumnFilled && topRowFilled && bottomRowFilled) ||
    (rightColumnFilled && topRowFilled && bottomRowFilled)
  );
}
/**
 * Process a U-shaped configuration
 */
function processUShapedConfiguration(
  cubes: PathCube[], 
  minRow: number, 
  maxRow: number, 
  minCol: number, 
  maxCol: number
): PathCube[] {
  // Create a map for quick lookup
  const cubeMap = new Map<string, PathCube>();
  cubes.forEach(cube => {
    cubeMap.set(`${cube.row},${cube.col}`, cube);
  });
  // Find the starting point (top-left or top-right corner)
  let startCube: PathCube | undefined;
  for (let r = minRow; r <= maxRow; r++) {
    for (let c = minCol; c <= maxCol; c++) {
      const key = `${r},${c}`;
      if (cubeMap.has(key)) {
        startCube = cubeMap.get(key);
        break;
      }
    }
    if (startCube) break;
  }
  if (!startCube) return cubes; // Safety check
  // Trace the U-shape path
  const result = traceUShapePath(cubes, cubeMap, startCube, minRow, maxRow, minCol, maxCol);
  return result;
}
/**
 * Trace the path in a U-shaped configuration
 */
function traceUShapePath(
  cubes: PathCube[],
  cubeMap: Map<string, PathCube>,
  startCube: PathCube,
  minRow: number,
  maxRow: number,
  minCol: number,
  maxCol: number
): PathCube[] {
  console.log("Tracing U-shape path starting from", startCube);
  const result = [...cubes];
  const visited = new Set<string>();
  const path: PathCube[] = [];
  // Step 1: Identify the two ends of the U
  const endpoints: PathCube[] = [];
  // Find endpoints (cubes with only one neighbor)
  for (const cube of cubes) {
    let neighborCount = 0;
    for (const dir of ['N', 'S', 'E', 'W'] as CompassDirection[]) {
      let checkRow = cube.row;
      let checkCol = cube.col;
      if (dir === 'N') checkRow--;
      else if (dir === 'S') checkRow++;
      else if (dir === 'E') checkCol++;
      else if (dir === 'W') checkCol--;
      if (cubeMap.has(`${checkRow},${checkCol}`)) {
        neighborCount++;
      }
    }
    if (neighborCount === 1) {
      endpoints.push(cube);
    }
  }
  // Ensure we have exactly 2 endpoints for a U-shape
  if (endpoints.length !== 2) {
    console.warn("Expected 2 endpoints for U-shape, found:", endpoints.length);
    // Fall back to original logic if we can't find exactly 2 endpoints
    return result;
  }
  // Sort endpoints to ensure consistent ordering
  // For U-shape, endpoints are typically in the same row (either top or bottom)
  endpoints.sort((a, b) => {
    if (a.row !== b.row) return a.row - b.row;
    return a.col - b.col;
  });
  const [startPoint, endPoint] = endpoints;
  console.log(`U-shape endpoints: Start at [${startPoint.row},${startPoint.col}], End at [${endPoint.row},${endPoint.col}]`);
  // Step 2: Create a new path array with the correct flow direction
  const id = (cube: PathCube) => `${cube.row},${cube.col}`;
  // Create a BFS path from start to end
  const bfsQueue: PathCube[] = [startPoint];
  const visited2 = new Set<string>();
  visited2.add(id(startPoint));
  const prev = new Map<string, PathCube>();
  // Run BFS to find path from start to end
  while (bfsQueue.length > 0) {
    const current = bfsQueue.shift()!;
    if (current.row === endPoint.row && current.col === endPoint.col) {
      break; // Found path to end
    }
    // Check all four directions
    for (const dir of ['N', 'S', 'E', 'W'] as CompassDirection[]) {
      let nextRow = current.row;
      let nextCol = current.col;
      if (dir === 'N') nextRow--;
      else if (dir === 'S') nextRow++;
      else if (dir === 'E') nextCol++;
      else if (dir === 'W') nextCol--;
      const nextKey = `${nextRow},${nextCol}`;
      if (cubeMap.has(nextKey) && !visited2.has(nextKey)) {
        const next = cubeMap.get(nextKey)!;
        bfsQueue.push(next);
        visited2.add(nextKey);
        prev.set(nextKey, current);
      }
    }
  }
  // Reconstruct path from start to end
  const orderedPath: PathCube[] = [];
  let current = endPoint;
  while (current.row !== startPoint.row || current.col !== startPoint.col) {
    orderedPath.unshift(current);
    const prevCube = prev.get(`${current.row},${current.col}`);
    if (!prevCube) break; // Safety check
    current = prevCube;
  }
  orderedPath.unshift(startPoint);
  // Track corners for proper connector identification
  const cornerLocations: {row: number, col: number}[] = [];
  // First identify corners in the path
  for (let i = 1; i < orderedPath.length - 1; i++) {
    const prev = orderedPath[i - 1];
    const current = orderedPath[i];
    const next = orderedPath[i + 1];
    // Calculate physical directions (not flow directions)
    let prevToCurrentDir: CompassDirection;
    if (prev.row < current.row) prevToCurrentDir = 'S';
    else if (prev.row > current.row) prevToCurrentDir = 'N';
    else if (prev.col < current.col) prevToCurrentDir = 'E';
    else prevToCurrentDir = 'W';
    let currentToNextDir: CompassDirection;
    if (current.row < next.row) currentToNextDir = 'S';
    else if (current.row > next.row) currentToNextDir = 'N';
    else if (current.col < next.col) currentToNextDir = 'E';
    else currentToNextDir = 'W';
    // A corner is where the physical direction changes
    if (prevToCurrentDir !== getOppositeDirection(currentToNextDir)) {
      cornerLocations.push({row: current.row, col: current.col});
      console.log(`Corner detected at [${current.row},${current.col}] - Path turns from ${prevToCurrentDir} to ${currentToNextDir}`);
    }
  }
  // Now set the entry/exit points for each cube
  // Remember: entry is where flow enters FROM, exit is where flow exits TO
  for (let i = 0; i < orderedPath.length; i++) {
    const cube = orderedPath[i];
    // Initialize flow direction as vertical by default
    cube.flowDirection = 'vertical';
    cube.rotation = 0;
    if (i === 0) {
      // First cube in path
      const next = orderedPath[i + 1];
      // Calculate direction to the next cube
      let dirToNext: CompassDirection;
      if (cube.row < next.row) dirToNext = 'S';
      else if (cube.row > next.row) dirToNext = 'N';
      else if (cube.col < next.col) dirToNext = 'E';
      else dirToNext = 'W';
      // For first cube: flow enters from outside, exits to next cube
      // Entry from outside (pick a direction that's not toward the next cube)
      // For a U-shape, entry should typically be N or S if next cube is in same row
      if (dirToNext === 'E' || dirToNext === 'W') {
        // Next cube is in same row, entry from N or S
        cube.entry = 'N';
      } else {
        // Next cube is in same column, entry from E or W
        cube.entry = 'E'; 
      }
      // Exit is toward the next cube
      cube.exit = dirToNext;
      // Set flow direction based on entry/exit
      if (isVerticalFlow(cube.entry) && isVerticalFlow(cube.exit)) {
        cube.flowDirection = 'vertical';
        cube.rotation = 0;
      } else if (isHorizontalFlow(cube.entry) && isHorizontalFlow(cube.exit)) {
        cube.flowDirection = 'horizontal';
        cube.rotation = 90;
      } else {
        // This is a corner - handle different entry/exit combinations
        const entryExit = `${cube.entry}-${cube.exit}`;
        switch (entryExit) {
          case 'N-E':
          case 'W-S':
            cube.rotation = 90;
            break;
          case 'N-W':
          case 'E-S':
            cube.rotation = 180;
            break;
          case 'S-E':
          case 'W-N':
            cube.rotation = 0;
            break;
          case 'S-W':
          case 'E-N':
            cube.rotation = 270;
            break;
          default:
            console.warn(`Unexpected entry-exit combination: ${entryExit}`);
        }
      }
    } else if (i === orderedPath.length - 1) {
      // Last cube in path
      const prev = orderedPath[i - 1];
      // Calculate direction from previous cube
      let dirFromPrev: CompassDirection;
      if (prev.row < cube.row) dirFromPrev = 'S';
      else if (prev.row > cube.row) dirFromPrev = 'N';
      else if (prev.col < cube.col) dirFromPrev = 'E';
      else dirFromPrev = 'W';
      // For last cube: flow enters from previous, exits to outside
      // Entry is from previous cube
      cube.entry = dirFromPrev;
      // Exit to outside (pick a direction that's not from the previous cube)
      // For a U-shape, exit should typically be N or S if previous cube is in same row
      if (isHorizontalFlow(dirFromPrev)) {
        // Previous cube is in same row, exit to N or S
        cube.exit = 'S';
      } else {
        // Previous cube is in same column, exit to E or W
        cube.exit = 'W';
      }
      // Set flow direction based on entry/exit
      if (isVerticalFlow(cube.entry) && isVerticalFlow(cube.exit)) {
        cube.flowDirection = 'vertical';
        cube.rotation = 0;
      } else if (isHorizontalFlow(cube.entry) && isHorizontalFlow(cube.exit)) {
        cube.flowDirection = 'horizontal';
        cube.rotation = 90;
      } else {
        // This is a corner - handle different entry/exit combinations
        const entryExit = `${cube.entry}-${cube.exit}`;
        switch (entryExit) {
          case 'N-E':
          case 'W-S':
            cube.rotation = 90;
            break;
          case 'N-W':
          case 'E-S':
            cube.rotation = 180;
            break;
          case 'S-E':
          case 'W-N':
            cube.rotation = 0;
            break;
          case 'S-W':
          case 'E-N':
            cube.rotation = 270;
            break;
          default:
            console.warn(`Unexpected entry-exit combination: ${entryExit}`);
        }
      }
    } else {
      // Middle cube
      const prev = orderedPath[i - 1];
      const next = orderedPath[i + 1];
      // Calculate direction from previous cube
      let dirFromPrev: CompassDirection;
      if (prev.row < cube.row) dirFromPrev = 'S';
      else if (prev.row > cube.row) dirFromPrev = 'N';
      else if (prev.col < cube.col) dirFromPrev = 'E';
      else dirFromPrev = 'W';
      // Calculate direction to next cube
      let dirToNext: CompassDirection;
      if (cube.row < next.row) dirToNext = 'S';
      else if (cube.row > next.row) dirToNext = 'N';
      else if (cube.col < next.col) dirToNext = 'E';
      else dirToNext = 'W';
      // Set entry and exit
      cube.entry = dirFromPrev;
      cube.exit = dirToNext;
      // Check if this is a corner
      const isCorner = cornerLocations.some(loc => loc.row === cube.row && loc.col === cube.col);
      if (isCorner) {
        console.log(`Setting up corner at [${cube.row},${cube.col}] with entry=${cube.entry}, exit=${cube.exit}`);
        // For corners, we need to handle rotation based on the specific turn
        const entryExit = `${cube.entry}-${cube.exit}`;
        switch (entryExit) {
          case 'N-E':
          case 'W-S':
            cube.rotation = 90;
            break;
          case 'N-W':
          case 'E-S':
            cube.rotation = 180;
            break;
          case 'S-E':
          case 'W-N':
            cube.rotation = 0;
            break;
          case 'S-W':
          case 'E-N':
            cube.rotation = 270;
            break;
          default:
            console.warn(`Unexpected entry-exit combination: ${entryExit}`);
        }
      } else {
        // For straight connections, set flow direction
        if (isVerticalFlow(cube.entry) && isVerticalFlow(cube.exit)) {
          cube.flowDirection = 'vertical';
          cube.rotation = 0;
        } else if (isHorizontalFlow(cube.entry) && isHorizontalFlow(cube.exit)) {
          cube.flowDirection = 'horizontal';
          cube.rotation = 90;
        } else {
          console.warn(`Invalid straight flow: entry=${cube.entry}, exit=${cube.exit} at [${cube.row},${cube.col}]`);
          // Force a valid flow direction
          if (isVerticalFlow(cube.entry) || isVerticalFlow(cube.exit)) {
            cube.flowDirection = 'vertical';
            cube.entry = 'N';
            cube.exit = 'S';
            cube.rotation = 0;
          } else {
            cube.flowDirection = 'horizontal';
            cube.entry = 'W';
            cube.exit = 'E';
            cube.rotation = 90;
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
  // Debug output of final path
  console.log("Analyzed path:", orderedPath.map(cube => ({
    id: `${cube.row},${cube.col}`,
    row: cube.row, 
    col: cube.col, 
    entry: cube.entry, 
    exit: cube.exit
  })));
  // Update the original cubes with the new path information
  for (const pathCube of orderedPath) {
    const original = result.find(c => c.row === pathCube.row && c.col === pathCube.col);
    if (original) {
      original.entry = pathCube.entry;
      original.exit = pathCube.exit;
      original.flowDirection = pathCube.flowDirection;
      original.rotation = pathCube.rotation;
    }
  }
  return result;
}
/**
 * Check if the configuration forms an L-shape
 */
function isLShapedConfiguration(
  cubes: PathCube[], 
  minRow: number, 
  maxRow: number, 
  minCol: number, 
  maxCol: number
): boolean {
  // An L-shape typically has width and height >= 2 and a single corner
  if ((maxRow - minRow < 1 && maxCol - minCol < 1) || cubes.length < 3) {
    return false;
  }
  // Create a grid representation to analyze shape
  const grid: boolean[][] = [];
  for (let r = minRow; r <= maxRow; r++) {
    grid[r - minRow] = [];
    for (let c = minCol; c <= maxCol; c++) {
      grid[r - minRow][c - minCol] = false;
    }
  }
  // Mark occupied cells
  cubes.forEach(cube => {
    grid[cube.row - minRow][cube.col - minCol] = true;
  });
  // Check for L-shape pattern
  // For an L-shape, we should have exactly one corner where two perpendicular lines meet
  let cornerCount = 0;
  for (let r = 1; r < grid.length; r++) {
    for (let c = 1; c < grid[r].length; c++) {
      // Check if this position and its diagonal neighbor are empty
      // while its horizontal and vertical neighbors are filled
      if (!grid[r][c] && !grid[r-1][c-1] && grid[r-1][c] && grid[r][c-1]) {
        cornerCount++;
      }
      // Check the opposite pattern too
      if (grid[r][c] && grid[r-1][c-1] && !grid[r-1][c] && !grid[r][c-1]) {
        cornerCount++;
      }
    }
  }
  return cornerCount === 1;
}
/**
 * Process an L-shaped configuration
 */
function processLShapedConfiguration(
  cubes: PathCube[], 
  minRow: number, 
  maxRow: number, 
  minCol: number, 
  maxCol: number
): PathCube[] {
  // Create a map for quick lookup
  const cubeMap = new Map<string, PathCube>();
  cubes.forEach(cube => {
    cubeMap.set(`${cube.row},${cube.col}`, cube);
  });
  // Find endpoints (cubes with only one neighbor)
  const endpoints: PathCube[] = [];
  cubes.forEach(cube => {
    let neighborCount = 0;
    const directions: CompassDirection[] = ['N', 'S', 'E', 'W'];
    for (const dir of directions) {
      let checkRow = cube.row;
      let checkCol = cube.col;
      if (dir === 'N') checkRow--;
      else if (dir === 'S') checkRow++;
      else if (dir === 'E') checkCol++;
      else if (dir === 'W') checkCol--;
      if (cubeMap.has(`${checkRow},${checkCol}`)) {
        neighborCount++;
      }
    }
    if (neighborCount === 1) {
      endpoints.push(cube);
    }
  });
  // If we found exactly two endpoints, trace the path from one to the other
  if (endpoints.length === 2) {
    return traceLShapePath(cubes, cubeMap, endpoints[0]);
  }
  // Fallback: use the default analysis
  return analyzeAndTraceFlow(cubes);
}
/**
 * Trace the path in an L-shaped configuration
 */
function traceLShapePath(
  cubes: PathCube[],
  cubeMap: Map<string, PathCube>,
  startCube: PathCube
): PathCube[] {
  const result = [...cubes];
  const visited = new Set<string>();
  const path: PathCube[] = [];
  // Direction priority
  const directions: CompassDirection[] = ['S', 'E', 'N', 'W'];
  // Trace the path
  let current = startCube;
  visited.add(`${current.row},${current.col}`);
  path.push(current);
  while (path.length < cubes.length) {
    let found = false;
    for (const dir of directions) {
      let nextRow = current.row;
      let nextCol = current.col;
      // Determine the next position based on direction
      if (dir === 'N') nextRow--;
      else if (dir === 'S') nextRow++;
      else if (dir === 'E') nextCol++;
      else if (dir === 'W') nextCol--;
      const nextKey = `${nextRow},${nextCol}`;
      if (cubeMap.has(nextKey) && !visited.has(nextKey)) {
        // Found next cube
        const next = cubeMap.get(nextKey)!;
        // Set the exit direction for current cube
        current.exit = dir;
        // Set the entry direction for next cube
        next.entry = getOppositeDirection(dir);
        // Move to next cube
        current = next;
        visited.add(nextKey);
        path.push(current);
        found = true;
        break;
      }
    }
    if (!found) break; // No more cubes to add to path
  }
  // Set the exit for the last cube (typically outward)
  if (path.length > 0) {
    const lastCube = path[path.length - 1];
    // Find a direction with no neighbors
    for (const dir of directions) {
      let checkRow = lastCube.row;
      let checkCol = lastCube.col;
      if (dir === 'N') checkRow--;
      else if (dir === 'S') checkRow++;
      else if (dir === 'E') checkCol++;
      else if (dir === 'W') checkCol--;
      if (!cubeMap.has(`${checkRow},${checkCol}`)) {
        lastCube.exit = dir;
        break;
      }
    }
    // Also set an entry for the first cube if not already set
    if (!startCube.entry) {
      for (const dir of directions) {
        let checkRow = startCube.row;
        let checkCol = startCube.col;
        if (dir === 'N') checkRow--;
        else if (dir === 'S') checkRow++;
        else if (dir === 'E') checkCol++;
        else if (dir === 'W') checkCol--;
        if (!cubeMap.has(`${checkRow},${checkCol}`)) {
          startCube.entry = dir;
          break;
        }
      }
    }
  }
  // Update the original cubes with the new path information
  path.forEach(pathCube => {
    const original = result.find(c => c.row === pathCube.row && c.col === pathCube.col);
    if (original) {
      original.entry = pathCube.entry;
      original.exit = pathCube.exit;
    }
  });
  return result;
}
/**
 * Analyze complex configurations and trace a valid flow
 */
function analyzeAndTraceFlow(cubes: PathCube[]): PathCube[] {
  // For more complex configurations, we need to find a valid path through all cubes
  // This is a simplified depth-first search approach
  // Create a map for quick lookup
  const cubeMap = new Map<string, PathCube>();
  cubes.forEach(cube => {
    cubeMap.set(`${cube.row},${cube.col}`, cube);
  });
  // Find a starting cube (preferably an endpoint with only one neighbor)
  let startCube = cubes[0]; // Default
  for (const cube of cubes) {
    let neighborCount = 0;
    const directions: CompassDirection[] = ['N', 'S', 'E', 'W'];
    for (const dir of directions) {
      let checkRow = cube.row;
      let checkCol = cube.col;
      if (dir === 'N') checkRow--;
      else if (dir === 'S') checkRow++;
      else if (dir === 'E') checkCol++;
      else if (dir === 'W') checkCol--;
      if (cubeMap.has(`${checkRow},${checkCol}`)) {
        neighborCount++;
      }
    }
    if (neighborCount === 1) {
      startCube = cube;
      break;
    }
  }
  // Trace a path from the start cube
  const result = [...cubes];
  const visited = new Set<string>();
  const path: PathCube[] = [];
  // Direction priority (can be adjusted as needed)
  const directions: CompassDirection[] = ['E', 'S', 'W', 'N'];
  // Trace the path
  let current = startCube;
  visited.add(`${current.row},${current.col}`);
  path.push(current);
  while (path.length < cubes.length) {
    let found = false;
    for (const dir of directions) {
      let nextRow = current.row;
      let nextCol = current.col;
      // Determine the next position based on direction
      if (dir === 'N') nextRow--;
      else if (dir === 'S') nextRow++;
      else if (dir === 'E') nextCol++;
      else if (dir === 'W') nextCol--;
      const nextKey = `${nextRow},${nextCol}`;
      if (cubeMap.has(nextKey) && !visited.has(nextKey)) {
        // Found next cube
        const next = cubeMap.get(nextKey)!;
        // Set the exit direction for current cube
        current.exit = dir;
        // Set the entry direction for next cube
        next.entry = getOppositeDirection(dir);
        // Move to next cube
        current = next;
        visited.add(nextKey);
        path.push(current);
        found = true;
        break;
      }
    }
    if (!found) break; // No more cubes to add to path
  }
  // Set the exit for the last cube
  if (path.length > 0) {
    const lastCube = path[path.length - 1];
    // Find a direction with no neighbors
    for (const dir of directions) {
      let checkRow = lastCube.row;
      let checkCol = lastCube.col;
      if (dir === 'N') checkRow--;
      else if (dir === 'S') checkRow++;
      else if (dir === 'E') checkCol++;
      else if (dir === 'W') checkCol--;
      if (!cubeMap.has(`${checkRow},${checkCol}`)) {
        lastCube.exit = dir;
        break;
      }
    }
    // Also set an entry for the first cube if not already set
    if (!startCube.entry) {
      for (const dir of directions) {
        let checkRow = startCube.row;
        let checkCol = startCube.col;
        if (dir === 'N') checkRow--;
        else if (dir === 'S') checkRow++;
        else if (dir === 'E') checkCol++;
        else if (dir === 'W') checkCol--;
        if (!cubeMap.has(`${checkRow},${checkCol}`)) {
          startCube.entry = dir;
          break;
        }
      }
    }
  }
  // Update the original cubes with the new path information
  path.forEach(pathCube => {
    const original = result.find(c => c.row === pathCube.row && c.col === pathCube.col);
    if (original) {
      original.entry = pathCube.entry;
      original.exit = pathCube.exit;
    }
  });
  return result;
}
/**
 * Get the opposite direction
 */
function getOppositeDirection(dir: CompassDirection | null): CompassDirection | null {
  if (!dir) return null;
  switch (dir) {
    case 'N': return 'S';
    case 'S': return 'N';
    case 'E': return 'W';
    case 'W': return 'E';
  }
}
/**
 * Main analyzePath function
 */
export const analyzePath = (cubes: PathCube[]): PathCube[] => {
  if (!cubes || cubes.length === 0) {
    return [];
  }
  // Create a copy to avoid mutating the input
  const pathCubes = [...cubes];
  // Normalize the flow throughout the path
  return normalizeFlow(pathCubes);
};
/**
 * Validate the flow to ensure all cubes have valid connections
 */
function validateFlow(cubes: PathCube[]): void {
  if (cubes.length <= 1) return;
  // Create a map for quick lookup
  const cubeMap = new Map<string, PathCube>();
  cubes.forEach(cube => {
    cubeMap.set(`${cube.row},${cube.col}`, cube);
  });
  // Validate connections
  for (let i = 0; i < cubes.length; i++) {
    const cube = cubes[i];
    // Skip if entry or exit is null
    if (!cube.entry || !cube.exit) continue;
    // Check if exit connects to next cube's entry
    const exitRow = cube.row + (cube.exit === 'N' ? -1 : cube.exit === 'S' ? 1 : 0);
    const exitCol = cube.col + (cube.exit === 'E' ? 1 : cube.exit === 'W' ? -1 : 0);
    const exitKey = `${exitRow},${exitCol}`;
    if (cubeMap.has(exitKey)) {
      const nextCube = cubeMap.get(exitKey)!;
      const expectedEntry = getOppositeDirection(cube.exit);
      if (nextCube.entry !== expectedEntry) {
        console.warn(`Connection mismatch: Cube at [${cube.row},${cube.col}] exits ${cube.exit}, 
          but cube at [${exitRow},${exitCol}] enters ${nextCube.entry} instead of ${expectedEntry}`);
      }
    } else if (i < cubes.length - 1) {
      console.warn(`Cube at [${cube.row},${cube.col}] exits ${cube.exit}, but no cube found at [${exitRow},${exitCol}]`);
    }
  }
}
</file>

<file path="src/utils/calculation/flowCalculator.ts">
import { GridCell, CompassDirection } from '../core/types';
import { STRAIGHT_PATHS, VALID_TURNS } from '../core/irrigationRules';
import { hasAdjacentCube } from '../shared/gridUtils';
/**
 * Determines if a direction is perpendicular to the flow
 */
export const isPerpendicularToFlow = (
  direction: CompassDirection,
  entry: CompassDirection | null,
  exit: CompassDirection | null
): boolean => {
  if (!entry || !exit) return true;
  const flow = `${entry}→${exit}`;
  if (STRAIGHT_PATHS.has(flow)) {
    return direction !== entry && direction !== exit;
  }
  return direction !== entry && direction !== exit;
};
/**
 * Gets the relative panel type based on flow direction
 */
export const getPanelType = (
  direction: CompassDirection,
  entry: CompassDirection | null,
  exit: CompassDirection | null
): 'side' | 'left' | 'right' => {
  if (!entry || !exit) return 'side';
  const flow = `${entry}→${exit}`;
  // For straight flow
  if (STRAIGHT_PATHS.has(flow)) {
    if (direction === entry || direction === exit) {
      return 'side';
    }
    return direction === getLeftSide(entry) ? 'left' : 'right';
  }
  // For corner flow
  if (VALID_TURNS.has(flow)) {
    if (direction === entry || direction === exit) {
      return 'side';
    }
    const turnType = VALID_TURNS.get(flow);
    const outsideDir = getOutsideOfTurn(entry, exit);
    return direction === outsideDir ? 
      (turnType === 'corner-right' ? 'right' : 'left') :
      (turnType === 'corner-right' ? 'left' : 'right');
  }
  return 'side';
};
/**
 * Gets the left side direction when looking in the direction of flow
 */
export const getLeftSide = (direction: CompassDirection): CompassDirection => {
  const leftSides: Record<CompassDirection, CompassDirection> = {
    N: 'W',
    S: 'E',
    E: 'N',
    W: 'S'
  };
  return leftSides[direction];
};
/**
 * Gets the outside direction of a turn
 */
export const getOutsideOfTurn = (entry: CompassDirection, exit: CompassDirection): CompassDirection => {
  const turnMap: Record<string, CompassDirection> = {
    'N→E': 'N',
    'E→S': 'E',
    'S→W': 'S',
    'W→N': 'W',
    'N→W': 'N',
    'W→S': 'W',
    'S→E': 'S',
    'E→N': 'E'
  };
  return turnMap[`${entry}→${exit}`] || entry;
};
</file>

<file path="src/utils/calculation/panelCalculator.ts">
import { Requirements, CompassDirection } from '@/components/types';
import { PathCube } from './flowAnalyzer';
import { STRAIGHT_PATHS, VALID_TURNS } from '../core/irrigationRules';
import { 
  isCorner, 
  isStraightFlow, 
  isUShapedConfiguration, 
  isLShapedConfiguration, 
  getAngleBetweenDirections,
  countCornerConnectors
} from './configurationDetector';
/**
 * Calculate panel requirements for a single cube configuration
 * 1 four-pack (2 side + 1 left + 1 right)
 */
const getSingleCubeRequirements = (): Requirements => ({
  fourPackRegular: 1,
  fourPackExtraTall: 0,
  twoPackRegular: 0,
  twoPackExtraTall: 0,
  sidePanels: 2,
  leftPanels: 1,
  rightPanels: 1,
  straightCouplings: 0,
  cornerConnectors: 0
});
/**
 * Calculate panel requirements for a straight line configuration
 * 1 four-pack (2 side + 1 left + 1 right)
 * 2 two-packs (2 sides each)
 * 2 straight couplings
 */
const getStraightLineRequirements = (): Requirements => ({
  fourPackRegular: 1,
  fourPackExtraTall: 0,
  twoPackRegular: 2,
  twoPackExtraTall: 0,
  sidePanels: 6,
  leftPanels: 1,
  rightPanels: 1,
  straightCouplings: 2,
  cornerConnectors: 0
});
/**
 * Calculate panel requirements for an L-shaped configuration
 * 1 four-pack (2 side + 1 right + 1 left)
 * 2 two-packs (2 sides each)
 * 1 corner connector
 * 1 straight coupling
 */
const getLShapeRequirements = (): Requirements => ({
  fourPackRegular: 1,
  fourPackExtraTall: 0,
  twoPackRegular: 2,
  twoPackExtraTall: 0,
  sidePanels: 5,
  leftPanels: 2,
  rightPanels: 1,
  straightCouplings: 1,
  cornerConnectors: 1
});
/**
 * Calculate panel requirements for a U-shaped configuration
 * 1 four-pack (2 side + 1 right + 1 left)
 * 2 two-packs (2 sides each)
 * 2 corner connectors
 * 2 straight couplings
 */
const getUShapeRequirements = (): Requirements => ({
  fourPackRegular: 1,  // Corrected from 2 to 1 as per PRD
  fourPackExtraTall: 0,
  twoPackRegular: 2,
  twoPackExtraTall: 0,
  sidePanels: 8,
  leftPanels: 2,
  rightPanels: 2,
  straightCouplings: 2,
  cornerConnectors: 2
});
/**
 * Calculate raw panel counts based on flow path analysis
 */
export const calculateFlowPathPanels = (cubes: PathCube[]): Requirements => {
  console.log("Calculating panels for path:", cubes);
  // Handle single cube case
  if (cubes.length === 1) {
    return getSingleCubeRequirements();
  }
  // Enhanced configuration detection
  // First check for specific shape configurations based on cube arrangement
  if (isUShape(cubes)) {
    console.log("Detected U-shape configuration (spatial analysis)");
    return getUShapeRequirements();
  }
  if (isLShape(cubes)) {
    console.log("Detected L-shape configuration (spatial analysis)");
    return getLShapeRequirements();
  }
  if (cubes.length === 3 && isStraightLine(cubes)) {
    console.log("Detected straight line configuration (3 cubes)");
    return getStraightLineRequirements();
  }
  // For custom or unknown configurations, calculate based on actual structure
  let sidePanelCount = 0;
  let leftPanelCount = 0;
  let rightPanelCount = 0;
  // Count corner connectors
  const cornerCount = countCornerConnectors(cubes);
  // Calculate straight couplings based on configuration
  // Each connection between cubes needs either a corner or straight coupling
  const totalConnections = cubes.length - 1;
  const straightCount = totalConnections - cornerCount;
  console.log(`Configuration has ${totalConnections} total connections: ${cornerCount} corners and ${straightCount} straight`);
  // First pass: Count total panels and mark the entry/exit points
  for (let i = 0; i < cubes.length; i++) {
    const cube = cubes[i];
    if (!cube.entry && !cube.exit) continue;
    // Count panels based on position in flow
    if (i === 0) {
      // First cube in flow gets left panel at entry
      leftPanelCount++;
    } else if (i === cubes.length - 1) {
      // Last cube in flow gets right panel at exit
      rightPanelCount++;
    }
    // Count exposed edges for side panels (excluding entry/exit points)
    const connectedEdgesCount = 
      (cube.entry ? 1 : 0) + (cube.exit ? 1 : 0);
    // Assuming 4 edges per cube, subtract connected edges to get side panel count
    sidePanelCount += 4 - connectedEdgesCount;
  }
  // Pack panels according to PRD rules
  // Priority: Use 1 four-pack first, then add two-packs as needed
  // Start with the mandatory four-pack (2 side + 1 left + 1 right)
  let remainingSidePanels = Math.max(0, sidePanelCount - 2);
  let remainingLeftPanels = Math.max(0, leftPanelCount - 1);
  let remainingRightPanels = Math.max(0, rightPanelCount - 1);
  // Use two-packs for remaining side panels (each two-pack has 2 side panels)
  const twoPackCount = Math.ceil(remainingSidePanels / 2);
  return {
    fourPackRegular: 1,  // Always use 1 four-pack per PRD
    fourPackExtraTall: 0,
    twoPackRegular: twoPackCount,
    twoPackExtraTall: 0,
    sidePanels: sidePanelCount,
    leftPanels: leftPanelCount,
    rightPanels: rightPanelCount,
    straightCouplings: straightCount,
    cornerConnectors: cornerCount
  };
};
/**
 * Helper function to get the opposite direction
 */
const getOppositeDirection = (dir: CompassDirection | null): CompassDirection | null => {
  if (!dir) return null;
  switch (dir) {
    case 'N': return 'S';
    case 'S': return 'N';
    case 'E': return 'W';
    case 'W': return 'E';
  }
};
/**
 * Detect if cubes form a U-shape based on spatial arrangement
 */
function isUShape(cubes: PathCube[]): boolean {
  if (cubes.length < 5) return false;
  // Find the bounding box
  const minRow = Math.min(...cubes.map(c => c.row));
  const maxRow = Math.max(...cubes.map(c => c.row));
  const minCol = Math.min(...cubes.map(c => c.col));
  const maxCol = Math.max(...cubes.map(c => c.col));
  // Create a grid representation
  const grid: boolean[][] = [];
  for (let r = minRow; r <= maxRow; r++) {
    grid[r - minRow] = [];
    for (let c = minCol; c <= maxCol; c++) {
      grid[r - minRow][c - minCol] = false;
    }
  }
  // Mark occupied cells
  cubes.forEach(cube => {
    grid[cube.row - minRow][cube.col - minCol] = true;
  });
  // Check if the configuration forms a U-shape
  // U-shape typically has a bottom row and two side columns filled
  const bottomRowFilled = grid[grid.length - 1].every(cell => cell);
  const leftColumnFilled = grid.every(row => row[0]);
  const rightColumnFilled = grid.every(row => row[row.length - 1]);
  const topRowFilled = grid[0].every(cell => cell);
  // U-shape can be oriented in different ways
  return (
    (bottomRowFilled && leftColumnFilled && rightColumnFilled) ||
    (topRowFilled && leftColumnFilled && rightColumnFilled) ||
    (leftColumnFilled && topRowFilled && bottomRowFilled) ||
    (rightColumnFilled && topRowFilled && bottomRowFilled)
  );
}
/**
 * Detect if cubes form an L-shape based on spatial arrangement
 */
function isLShape(cubes: PathCube[]): boolean {
  if (cubes.length < 3) return false;
  // Simple geometric detection: look for one 90-degree turn
  let cornerCount = 0;
  for (let i = 1; i < cubes.length - 1; i++) {
    const prevCube = cubes[i - 1];
    const currentCube = cubes[i];
    const nextCube = cubes[i + 1];
    // Calculate direction vectors
    const prevDirection = {
      dx: currentCube.col - prevCube.col,
      dy: currentCube.row - prevCube.row
    };
    const nextDirection = {
      dx: nextCube.col - currentCube.col,
      dy: nextCube.row - currentCube.row
    };
    // A 90-degree turn means the dot product is zero (vectors are perpendicular)
    const dotProduct = prevDirection.dx * nextDirection.dx + prevDirection.dy * nextDirection.dy;
    if (dotProduct === 0 && 
        (prevDirection.dx !== 0 || prevDirection.dy !== 0) && 
        (nextDirection.dx !== 0 || nextDirection.dy !== 0)) {
      cornerCount++;
    }
  }
  return cornerCount === 1;
}
/**
 * Detect if cubes form a straight line
 */
function isStraightLine(cubes: PathCube[]): boolean {
  if (cubes.length < 2) return false;
  // All cubes should be in the same row or column
  const allSameRow = cubes.every(cube => cube.row === cubes[0].row);
  const allSameCol = cubes.every(cube => cube.col === cubes[0].col);
  return allSameRow || allSameCol;
}
</file>

<file path="src/utils/calculation/panelCounter.ts">
import { GridCell, Requirements } from '@/components/types';
import { findConnectedCubes } from '../validation/flowValidator';
import { PathCube } from './flowAnalyzer';
import { isCorner, isStraightFlow, isLShapedConfiguration, isUShapedConfiguration } from './configurationDetector';
import { calculateFlowPathPanels } from './panelCalculator';
/**
 * Counts required panels for a grid configuration by analyzing the flow path
 */
export const countPanels = (grid: GridCell[][]): Requirements => {
  // Find all cubes and their flow paths
  let startCube: [number, number] | null = null;
  // Find the first cube with a connection
  for (let i = 0; i < grid.length && !startCube; i++) {
    for (let j = 0; j < grid[0].length && !startCube; j++) {
      if (grid[i][j].hasCube && 
          (grid[i][j].connections.entry || grid[i][j].connections.exit)) {
        startCube = [i, j];
        break;
      }
    }
  }
  // If no cube found with connections, look for any cube
  if (!startCube) {
    for (let i = 0; i < grid.length && !startCube; i++) {
      for (let j = 0; j < grid[0].length && !startCube; j++) {
        if (grid[i][j].hasCube) {
          startCube = [i, j];
          break;
        }
      }
    }
  }
  if (!startCube) {
    return {
      fourPackRegular: 0,
      fourPackExtraTall: 0,
      twoPackRegular: 0,
      twoPackExtraTall: 0,
      sidePanels: 0,
      leftPanels: 0,
      rightPanels: 0,
      straightCouplings: 0,
      cornerConnectors: 0
    };
  }
  // Get connected cubes and create path
  const connectedCubes = findConnectedCubes(grid, startCube[0], startCube[1]);
  const path = {
    cubes: connectedCubes.map(([row, col]) => ({
      row,
      col,
      entry: grid[row][col].connections.entry,
      exit: grid[row][col].connections.exit
    }))
  };
  // Calculate panels based on flow path and configuration
  return calculateFlowPathPanels(path.cubes);
};
</file>

<file path="src/utils/calculation/panelPacker.ts">
import { Requirements } from '@/components/types';
import { CONFIGURATION_RULES } from '../core/rules';
/**
 * Pack panels according to flow-based rules.
 * This function takes raw panel counts and optimizes them into standard packs
 * based on the configuration type.
 *
 * Ground truth configurations:
 * - Single cube (4 edges): 1 four-pack (2 side + 1 left + 1 right)
 * - Line (8 edges): 1 four-pack, 2 two-packs, 2 straight couplings
 * - L-shape (8 edges): 1 four-pack, 1 left panel, 1 two-pack, 1 corner connector, 1 straight coupling
 * - U-shape (12 edges): 1 four-pack, 2 two-packs, 2 corner connectors, 2 straight couplings
 */
export const packPanels = (requirements: Requirements): Requirements => {
  console.log("Packing panels for raw requirements:", requirements);
  // Calculate total panels for configuration identification
  const totalPanels = 
    requirements.sidePanels +
    requirements.leftPanels +
    requirements.rightPanels;
  console.log(`Total panels: ${totalPanels}, Corner connectors: ${requirements.cornerConnectors}, Straight couplings: ${requirements.straightCouplings}`);
  // Identify configuration pattern based on known configurations
  // U-shape configuration (12 edges)
  if (requirements.cornerConnectors === 2 && requirements.straightCouplings === 2) {
    console.log("Detected U-shape configuration");
    return CONFIGURATION_RULES.U_SHAPE;
  }
  // L-shape configuration (8 edges)
  else if (requirements.cornerConnectors === 1 && requirements.straightCouplings === 1) {
    console.log("Detected L-shape configuration");
    return CONFIGURATION_RULES.L_SHAPE;
  }
  // Line configuration (8 edges)
  else if (requirements.cornerConnectors === 0 && requirements.straightCouplings === 2) {
    console.log("Detected line configuration");
    return CONFIGURATION_RULES.THREE_LINE;
  }
  // Single cube configuration (4 edges)
  else if (totalPanels <= 4 && requirements.cornerConnectors === 0 && requirements.straightCouplings === 0) {
    console.log("Detected single cube configuration");
    return CONFIGURATION_RULES.SINGLE_CUBE;
  }
  // For custom configurations - optimized packing algorithm
  else {
    console.log("Custom configuration detected, using optimized packing algorithm");
    // Start with empty requirements
    const packedRequirements: Requirements = {
      fourPackRegular: 0,
      fourPackExtraTall: 0,
      twoPackRegular: 0,
      twoPackExtraTall: 0,
      leftPanels: 0,
      rightPanels: 0,
      sidePanels: 0,
      cornerConnectors: requirements.cornerConnectors,
      straightCouplings: requirements.straightCouplings
    };
    // Temporary counters for remaining panels
    let remainingSidePanels = requirements.sidePanels;
    let remainingLeftPanels = requirements.leftPanels;
    let remainingRightPanels = requirements.rightPanels;
    // Step 1: Always use four-packs first (combination of 2 side, 1 left, 1 right)
    // Calculate how many full four-packs we can create
    const maxFourPacks = Math.min(
      Math.floor(remainingSidePanels / 2),
      remainingLeftPanels,
      remainingRightPanels
    );
    packedRequirements.fourPackRegular = maxFourPacks;
    remainingSidePanels -= maxFourPacks * 2;
    remainingLeftPanels -= maxFourPacks;
    remainingRightPanels -= maxFourPacks;
    // Step 2: Pack remaining side panels into two-packs
    const maxTwoPacks = Math.ceil(remainingSidePanels / 2);
    packedRequirements.twoPackRegular = maxTwoPacks;
    remainingSidePanels -= maxTwoPacks * 2;
    // Step 3: Any remaining panels are kept as individual panels
    packedRequirements.sidePanels = Math.max(0, remainingSidePanels);
    packedRequirements.leftPanels = remainingLeftPanels;
    packedRequirements.rightPanels = remainingRightPanels;
    return packedRequirements;
  }
};
/**
 * Validate the panel packing against known configurations
 * This helps ensure our packing logic matches the expected outcomes
 */
export const validateConfiguration = (requirements: Requirements): boolean => {
  // Count total panels across all pack types
  const totalPanels = 
    requirements.sidePanels +
    requirements.leftPanels +
    requirements.rightPanels +
    (requirements.fourPackRegular * 4) +
    (requirements.twoPackRegular * 2);
  console.log("Validating configuration with total panels:", totalPanels);
  // Single cube (4 edges)
  if (totalPanels === 4 && requirements.cornerConnectors === 0 && requirements.straightCouplings === 0) {
    return requirements.fourPackRegular === 1 &&
           requirements.twoPackRegular === 0 &&
           requirements.leftPanels === 0 &&
           requirements.rightPanels === 0 &&
           requirements.sidePanels === 0;
  }
  // Line configuration (8 edges)
  if (requirements.cornerConnectors === 0 && requirements.straightCouplings === 2) {
    return requirements.fourPackRegular === 1 &&
           requirements.twoPackRegular === 2 &&
           requirements.leftPanels === 0 &&
           requirements.rightPanels === 0 &&
           requirements.sidePanels === 0;
  }
  // L-shape configuration (8 edges)
  if (requirements.cornerConnectors === 1 && requirements.straightCouplings === 1) {
    return requirements.fourPackRegular === 1 &&
           requirements.twoPackRegular === 1 &&
           requirements.leftPanels === 1 &&
           requirements.rightPanels === 0 &&
           requirements.sidePanels === 0;
  }
  // U-shape configuration (12 edges)
  if (requirements.cornerConnectors === 2 && requirements.straightCouplings === 2) {
    return requirements.fourPackRegular === 1 &&
           requirements.twoPackRegular === 2 &&
           requirements.leftPanels === 0 &&
           requirements.rightPanels === 0 &&
           requirements.sidePanels === 0;
  }
  // Allow other valid configurations that don't fit the standard patterns
  return true;
};
</file>

<file path="src/utils/calculation/requirementsCalculator.ts">
import { Requirements } from '@/components/types';
import { CONFIGURATION_RULES } from '../core/rules';
import { PathCube, analyzePath, isUShape, isLShape, isStraightLine } from './flowAnalyzer';
/**
 * Calculates panel and connector requirements based on analyzed path
 */
export const calculateRequirements = (path: PathCube[]): Requirements => {
  // Handle empty path
  if (!path.length) {
    return {
      fourPackRegular: 0,
      fourPackExtraTall: 0,
      twoPackRegular: 0,
      twoPackExtraTall: 0,
      sidePanels: 0,
      leftPanels: 0,
      rightPanels: 0,
      straightCouplings: 0,
      cornerConnectors: 0
    };
  }
  const analyzedPath = analyzePath(path);
  // Single cube
  if (analyzedPath.length === 1) {
    return CONFIGURATION_RULES.SINGLE_CUBE;
  }
  // L-shaped configuration
  if (isLShape(analyzedPath)) {
    return CONFIGURATION_RULES.L_SHAPE;
  }
  // Three cubes in a straight line
  if (isStraightLine(analyzedPath)) {
    return CONFIGURATION_RULES.THREE_LINE;
  }
  // U-shaped configuration
  if (isUShape(analyzedPath)) {
    return CONFIGURATION_RULES.U_SHAPE;
  }
  // Default to single cube if no valid configuration found
  return CONFIGURATION_RULES.SINGLE_CUBE;
};
</file>

<file path="src/utils/core/flowVisualizer.ts">
import { GridCell, CompassDirection } from '@/components/types';
interface FlowVisualization {
  redCubes: { row: number; col: number; subRow: number; subCol: number }[];
  flowPath: { row: number; col: number; subRow: number; subCol: number; direction: string }[];
}
export const visualizeFlow = (grid: GridCell[][]): FlowVisualization => {
  const redCubes: { row: number; col: number; subRow: number; subCol: number }[] = [];
  const flowPath: { row: number; col: number; subRow: number; subCol: number; direction: string }[] = [];
  // First pass: Find all cubes with flow (red cubes)
  grid.forEach((row, rowIndex) => {
    row.forEach((cell, colIndex) => {
      if (cell.hasCube && cell.connections.entry && cell.connections.exit) {
        // Map the entry/exit points to subgrid positions
        const subgridMap = {
          'N': { entry: { subRow: 0, subCol: 1 }, exit: { subRow: 1, subCol: 1 } },
          'S': { entry: { subRow: 1, subCol: 1 }, exit: { subRow: 2, subCol: 1 } },
          'E': { entry: { subRow: 1, subCol: 1 }, exit: { subRow: 1, subCol: 2 } },
          'W': { entry: { subRow: 1, subCol: 0 }, exit: { subRow: 1, subCol: 1 } }
        };
        const entry = subgridMap[cell.connections.entry as CompassDirection];
        const exit = subgridMap[cell.connections.exit as CompassDirection];
        if (entry && exit) {
          redCubes.push({
            row: rowIndex,
            col: colIndex,
            subRow: entry.entry.subRow,
            subCol: entry.entry.subCol
          });
          redCubes.push({
            row: rowIndex,
            col: colIndex,
            subRow: exit.exit.subRow,
            subCol: exit.exit.subCol
          });
        }
      }
    });
  });
  // Second pass: Build the continuous flow path
  let currentCell: GridCell | null = null;
  let visited = new Set<string>();
  // Find the starting cell (one with only exit or where entry is 'W')
  grid.forEach((row, rowIndex) => {
    row.forEach((cell, colIndex) => {
      if (cell.hasCube && cell.connections.entry === 'W') {
        currentCell = cell;
        visited.add(`${rowIndex},${colIndex}`);
        // Add starting point to flow path
        flowPath.push({
          row: rowIndex,
          col: colIndex,
          subRow: 1,
          subCol: 0,
          direction: 'start'
        });
      }
    });
  });
  // Follow the path through connected cubes
  while (currentCell) {
    const currentPos = grid.findIndex(row => 
      row.findIndex(cell => cell === currentCell) !== -1
    );
    const currentRow = Math.floor(currentPos / grid.length);
    const currentCol = currentPos % grid.length;
    // Add current cell's exit point to flow path
    flowPath.push({
      row: currentRow,
      col: currentCol,
      subRow: 1,
      subCol: 1,
      direction: currentCell.connections.exit || 'end'
    });
    // Find next cell based on current cell's exit direction
    let nextCell: GridCell | null = null;
    if (currentCell.connections.exit === 'N' && currentRow > 0) {
      nextCell = grid[currentRow - 1][currentCol];
    } else if (currentCell.connections.exit === 'S' && currentRow < grid.length - 1) {
      nextCell = grid[currentRow + 1][currentCol];
    } else if (currentCell.connections.exit === 'E' && currentCol < grid[0].length - 1) {
      nextCell = grid[currentRow][currentCol + 1];
    } else if (currentCell.connections.exit === 'W' && currentCol > 0) {
      nextCell = grid[currentRow][currentCol - 1];
    }
    // Move to next cell if it exists and hasn't been visited
    if (nextCell && nextCell.hasCube && !visited.has(`${currentRow},${currentCol}`)) {
      currentCell = nextCell;
      visited.add(`${currentRow},${currentCol}`);
    } else {
      currentCell = null;
    }
  }
  console.group('Flow Path Visualization');
  console.log('Red Cube Locations:', redCubes);
  console.log('Continuous Flow Path:', flowPath);
  // Visual representation in console
  const visualGrid = Array(grid.length * 2 + 1).fill('.').map(() => 
    Array(grid[0].length * 2 + 1).fill('.')
  );
  // Mark red cubes with 'R'
  redCubes.forEach(({row, col, subRow, subCol}) => {
    visualGrid[row * 2 + subRow][col * 2 + subCol] = 'R';
  });
  // Mark flow path with 'F'
  flowPath.forEach(({row, col, subRow, subCol}) => {
    visualGrid[row * 2 + subRow][col * 2 + subCol] = 'F';
  });
  console.log('Visual Grid (R=Red Cube, F=Flow Path, .=Empty):');
  visualGrid.forEach(row => console.log(row.join(' ')));
  console.groupEnd();
  return { redCubes, flowPath };
};
</file>

<file path="src/utils/core/gridCell.ts">
import { GridCell, CompassDirection, CubeConnection } from '@/components/types';
/**
 * Creates an empty grid cell without a cube
 */
export const createEmptyCell = (): GridCell => ({
  hasCube: false,
  connections: { entry: null, exit: null },
  claddingEdges: new Set<CompassDirection>(),
  rotation: 0
});
/**
 * Creates a grid cell with a cube and optional edges and connections
 */
const ROTATION_MAP: Record<CompassDirection, 0 | 90 | 180 | 270> = {
  N: 0,   // Flow from North to South
  E: 90,  // Flow from East to West
  S: 180, // Flow from South to North
  W: 270  // Flow from West to East
} as const;
export const createCubeCell = (
  edges: CompassDirection[] = [],
  connections: CubeConnection = { entry: null, exit: null }
): GridCell => ({
  hasCube: true,
  connections,
  claddingEdges: new Set(edges),
  rotation: connections.entry ? ROTATION_MAP[connections.entry] : 0
});
/**
 * Creates a cell with irrigation flow
 */
export const createFlowCell = (entry: CompassDirection, exit: CompassDirection): GridCell => {
  // Calculate rotation based on entry direction
  const rotation = ROTATION_MAP[entry];
  const opposites = { N: 'S', S: 'N', E: 'W', W: 'E' } as const;
  const edges: CompassDirection[] = ['N', 'S', 'E', 'W'];
  // Remove entry and exit directions from edges as they'll have connectors
  const claddingEdges = new Set(
    edges.filter(edge => 
      edge !== entry && 
      edge !== exit && 
      edge !== opposites[entry] && 
      edge !== opposites[exit]
    )
  );
  return {
    hasCube: true,
    connections: { entry, exit },
    claddingEdges,
    rotation
  };
};
</file>

<file path="src/utils/core/irrigationRules.ts">
import { CompassDirection } from './types';
import { getOppositeDirection } from '../shared/gridUtils';
// Define valid turns and their coupling types
export const VALID_TURNS = new Map<string, 'corner-left' | 'corner-right'>([
  ['N→E', 'corner-right'],
  ['E→S', 'corner-right'],
  ['S→W', 'corner-right'],
  ['W→N', 'corner-right'],
  ['N→W', 'corner-left'],
  ['W→S', 'corner-left'],
  ['S→E', 'corner-left'],
  ['E→N', 'corner-left'],
]);
export const STRAIGHT_PATHS = new Set(['N→S', 'S→N', 'E→W', 'W→E']);
export const IRRIGATION_RULES = {
  SINGLE_CUBE: {
    EDGES: 4,
    PANELS: {
      FOUR_PACK: { SIDES: 2, LEFT: 1, RIGHT: 1 },
      COUPLINGS: { STRAIGHT: 0, CORNER: 0 }
    }
  },
  LINE_THREE: {
    EDGES: 8,
    PANELS: {
      FOUR_PACK: { SIDES: 2, LEFT: 1, RIGHT: 1 },
      TWO_PACKS: 2, // 2 two-packs with 2 sides each
      COUPLINGS: { STRAIGHT: 2, CORNER: 0 }
    }
  },
  L_SHAPE: {
    EDGES: 8,
    PANELS: {
      FOUR_PACK: { SIDES: 2, LEFT: 1, RIGHT: 1 },
      EXTRA: { SIDES: 1, LEFT: 1 },
      TWO_PACKS: 2,
      COUPLINGS: { STRAIGHT: 1, CORNER: 1 }
    }
  },
  U_SHAPE: {
    EDGES: 12,
    PANELS: {
      FOUR_PACK: { SIDES: 2, LEFT: 1, RIGHT: 1 },
      TWO_PACKS: 2,
      COUPLINGS: { STRAIGHT: 2, CORNER: 2 }
    }
  }
} as const;

<file path="src/utils/core/panelRules.ts">
import { GridCell } from '@/components/types';
import { CompassDirection } from './types';
import { findConnectedCubes } from '../validation/flowValidator';
export type PanelType = 'side' | 'left' | 'right';
interface PanelConfiguration {
  type: PanelType;
  direction: CompassDirection;
}
/**
 * Determines the panel configuration for a cube based on its position in the irrigation path
 * Rules:
 * 1. Side panels are always perpendicular to the flow direction
 * 2. Left/right panels are determined by the flow direction, like a pipeline:
 *    - Left panel is always on the left side when facing the flow direction
 *    - Right panel is always on the right side when facing the flow direction
 * 3. Corner pieces maintain flow direction rules (left remains on left of flow)
 */
export function determinePanelConfiguration(
  grid: GridCell[][],
  row: number,
  col: number
): PanelConfiguration[] {
  const connectedCubes = findConnectedCubes(grid, row, col);
  const currentIndex = connectedCubes.findIndex(([r, c]) => r === row && c === col);
  if (currentIndex === -1) return [];
  const prevCube = currentIndex > 0 ? connectedCubes[currentIndex - 1] : null;
  const nextCube = currentIndex < connectedCubes.length - 1 ? connectedCubes[currentIndex + 1] : null;
  // Determine flow direction
  const getDirection = (from: [number, number], to: [number, number]): CompassDirection => {
    const [fromRow, fromCol] = from;
    const [toRow, toCol] = to;
    if (toRow < fromRow) return 'N';
    if (toRow > fromRow) return 'S';
    if (toCol < fromCol) return 'W';
    return 'E';
  };
  const configurations: PanelConfiguration[] = [];
  // Handle entry point
  if (prevCube) {
    const entryDir = getDirection([row, col], prevCube);
    const [leftDir, rightDir] = getPerpendicularDirections(entryDir);
    configurations.push(
      { type: 'left', direction: leftDir },
      { type: 'right', direction: rightDir }
    );
  }
  // Handle exit point
  if (nextCube) {
    const exitDir = getDirection([row, col], nextCube);
    // Only add side panels for straight sections or endpoints
    if (!prevCube || isOppositeDirection(exitDir, getDirection([row, col], prevCube))) {
      configurations.push({ type: 'side', direction: getSideDirection(exitDir) });
    }
  } else if (!prevCube) {
    // Isolated cube - default configuration
    configurations.push(
      { type: 'side', direction: 'N' },
      { type: 'side', direction: 'S' }
    );
  }
  return configurations;
}
// Helper functions
function getPerpendicularDirections(dir: CompassDirection): [CompassDirection, CompassDirection] {
  const dirMap: Record<CompassDirection, [CompassDirection, CompassDirection]> = {
    'N': ['W', 'E'],
    'S': ['W', 'E'],
    'E': ['N', 'S'],
    'W': ['N', 'S']
  };
  return dirMap[dir];
}
function isOppositeDirection(dir1: CompassDirection, dir2: CompassDirection): boolean {
  return (dir1 === 'N' && dir2 === 'S') ||
         (dir1 === 'S' && dir2 === 'N') ||
         (dir1 === 'E' && dir2 === 'W') ||
         (dir1 === 'W' && dir2 === 'E');
}
function getSideDirection(flowDir: CompassDirection): CompassDirection {
  const dirMap: Record<CompassDirection, CompassDirection> = {
    'N': 'E',
    'S': 'E',
    'E': 'N',
    'W': 'N'
  };
  return dirMap[flowDir];
}
</file>

<file path="src/utils/core/presetConfigurations.ts">
import { GridCell, CompassDirection } from './types';
import { createTestGrid } from '../testing/testUtils';
export const createSingleCube = (): GridCell[][] => {
  return createTestGrid(
    [[1]],
    {
      '0,0': { entry: 'W', exit: 'E' }  // Simple W→E flow
    }
  );
};
export const createLineCubes = (): GridCell[][] => {
  return createTestGrid(
    [[1, 1, 1]],
    {
      '0,0': { entry: 'W', exit: 'E' },  // Start of flow
      '0,1': { entry: 'W', exit: 'E' },  // Middle
      '0,2': { entry: 'W', exit: 'E' }   // End of flow
    }
  );
};
export const createLShapeCubes = (): GridCell[][] => {
  return createTestGrid(
    [[1, 1],
     [0, 1]],
    {
      '0,0': { entry: 'W', exit: 'E' },   // Start of flow, horizontal W→E
      '0,1': { entry: 'W', exit: 'S' },   // Corner turn, W→S (corner-left)
      '1,1': { entry: 'N', exit: 'S' }    // End block, vertical N→S
    }
  );
};
export const createUShapeCubes = (): GridCell[][] => {
  return createTestGrid(
    [[1, 1, 1],
     [1, 0, 1]],
    {
      '0,0': { entry: 'W', exit: 'S' },   // First corner
      '1,0': { entry: 'N', exit: 'E' },   // Bottom left
      '1,1': { entry: 'W', exit: 'E' },   // Bottom middle
      '1,2': { entry: 'W', exit: 'N' },   // Bottom right
      '0,2': { entry: 'S', exit: 'E' }    // Second corner
    }
  );
};
// Helper to validate a configuration matches expected panel counts
export interface ExpectedCounts {
  sidePanels: number;
  leftPanels: number;
  rightPanels: number;
  straightCouplings: number;
  cornerConnectors: number;

    rightPanels: 1,   // Right side
    straightCouplings: 0,
    cornerConnectors: 0
  },
  lineCubes: {
    sidePanels: 6,    // 2 from four-pack + 2 + 2 from two-packs

    rightPanels: 1,   // Right side at end
    straightCouplings: 2,
    cornerConnectors: 0
  },
  lShapeCubes: {
    sidePanels: 5,    // 2 from four-pack + 2 from two-pack + 1 extra
    leftPanels: 2,    // 1 from four-pack + 1 extra
    rightPanels: 1,   // from four-pack
    straightCouplings: 1,
    cornerConnectors: 1

    rightPanels: 1,   // Right side at end
    straightCouplings: 2,

  }
} as const;
